thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 23 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Anbang Insurance Has No Immediate Plans To Sell Shares In Tongrentang, Chang Chun Eurasia, Dashang, Gemdale

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Anbang Insurance Has No Immediate Plans To Sell Shares In Tongrentang, Chang Chun Eurasia, Dashang, Gemdale

organizations.name: chang chun eurasia group co ltd

text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Beijing Tongrentang Co Ltd: Chang Chun Eurasia Group Co Ltd: Dashang Co Ltd: Gemdale Corp
* SAY RECEIVE NOTICE FROM ANBANG INSURANCE SAYING THAT THE INSURER AND ITS UNITS' OPERATIONS ARE STABLE AND HAVE ABUNDANT CASH, SO THERE ARE NO IMMEDIATE PLANS TO CUT STAKE IN THE COMPANIES Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2CF07Z4 ; bit.ly/2ot2gSD ; bit.ly/2sKq224 ; bit.ly/2CDVP4h Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
